headline: Here’s Why LyondellBasell Industries N.V. (LYB) Fell 21.3% in Q4
summary: Alluvium Asset Management, an asset management company, released its “Conventum – Alluvium Global Fund” fourth-quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the quarter, The Fund was up 1.3% in EUR terms and 5.4% in AUD terms but down 5.9% in USD terms. In addition, please check the fund’s […]

headline: LYB Launches Pro-fax EP649U for Rigid Packaging Market
summary: LyondellBasell Industries introduces Pro-fax EP649U, a new polypropylene impact copolymer, for thin-wall packaging.
